text: A Hidden Life () is a 2001 Brazilian drama movie directed by Suzana Amaral and based on the novel of the same name by Autran Dourado. It stars Sabrina Greve, Eliane Giardini, Cac√° Carvalho, Neuza Borges. ==Other websites== * Category:2001 drama movies Category:Brazilian movies Category:Movies set in Brazil
